feature.name: Average syllable count per word
feature.description: Average number of syllables per word (using the Flesh algorithm)

feature.name: Flesh reading ease
feature.description: Flesh reading ease

feature.name: Flesh-Kincaid grade level
feature.description: Flesh-Kincaid grade level

feature.name: Letter-bigram components
feature.description: First 20 principal components of letter bigram frequencies

feature.name: Part-of-speech frequencies
feature.description: Relative frequencies of 20 parts of speech (using the Stanford tagger)

feature.name: Rate of misspelling
feature.description: Proportion of misspelled words according to aspell's English dictionary

feature.name: Topic membership probabilities (24 topics)
feature.description: Vocabulary size divided by word count

feature.name: Contains Words
feature.description: Whether or not there is at least one word consisting of non whitespace chararacters in a text. Set to 1.0 if so and to 0.0 if not.

feature.name: Number of Words
feature.description: The total number of words in the text. This count is not of unique words, so words that occur more than once will be counted more than once. Whitespace characters are not counted as words.

feature.name: Number of Unique Words
feature.description: The total number unique of words in the text. This means that words that occur more than once are not counted twice. Whitespace characters are not counted as words.

feature.name: Word Variety
feature.description: The total number of words in the text divided by the number of unique words.

feature.name: Letters Per Word Average
feature.description: The average number of characters per word. Punctuation and numerical characters are included in the count of characters for a given word. Whitespace characters are not included in calculations.

feature.name: Letters Per Word Variance
feature.description: The variance of the number of characters per word. Punctuation and numerical characters are included in the count of characters for a given word. Whitespace characters are not included in calculations.

feature.name: Number of Lines
feature.description: The total number of lines in the text. This count does not include lines consisting only of line breaks.

feature.name: Words Per Line Average
feature.description: The average number of words per line. Blank lines are not included in this calculation.

feature.name: Words Per Line Variance
feature.description: The variance of the number of words per line. Blank lines are not included in this calculation.

feature.name: Number of Segments
feature.description: The total number of segments (e.g. verses, choruses, etc.) in the text. Segments are assumed to be segmented by blank lines, and lines are segmented by line breaks. Lines consisting only of line breaks are filtered out. This count does not include lines consisting only of line breaks.

feature.name: Lines Per Segment Average
feature.description: The average number of lines per segments (e.g. verses, choruses, etc.) in the text. Segments are assumed to be segmented by blank lines, and lines are segmented by line breaks. Lines consisting only of line breaks are filtered out. This count does not include lines consisting only of line breaks.

feature.name: Lines Per Segment Variance
feature.description: The variance of the number of lines per segments (e.g. verses, choruses, etc.) in the text. Segments are assumed to be segmented by blank lines, and lines are segmented by line breaks. Lines consisting only of line breaks are filtered out. This count does not include lines consisting only of line breaks.

feature.name: Automated Readability Index
feature.description: This index is designed to provide a measure of the understandability of a text, and provides a result that is roughly equivalent to a U.S. grade level. More information is available at en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Automated_Readability_Index

feature.name: Word Profile Match Traditional Blues
feature.description: The percentage of words in the text that are found in a list of keywords. This percentage is based on all words present in the text, not just the unique words. Case is ignored. The keywords are: ain't baby baby, blues boy child child, evil gonna hot lord, love mojo oh old red tamales working worried yeah.

feature.name: Word Profile Match Modern Blues
feature.description: The percentage of words in the text that are found in a list of keywords. This percentage is based on all words present in the text, not just the unique words. Case is ignored. The keywords are: 'cause ain't baby baby, bad blues down feel gonna little lord love shame wanna woman wrong yeah yeah,.

feature.name: Word Profile Match Classical
feature.description: The percentage of words in the text that are found in a list of keywords. This percentage is based on all words present in the text, not just the unique words. Case is ignored. The keywords are: auf bist dein dich die dies du dum et finde gott herz ich ihn ist la le mein mi mir nach nicht thy und.

feature.name: Word Profile Match Jazz
feature.description: The percentage of words in the text that are found in a list of keywords. This percentage is based on all words present in the text, not just the unique words. Case is ignored. The keywords are: ain't baby blue cheek good heart love never please right.

feature.name: Word Profile Match Rap
feature.description: The percentage of words in the text that are found in a list of keywords. This percentage is based on all words present in the text, not just the unique words. Case is ignored. The keywords are: 'em ain't ass bitch cuz fuck gonna gotta hit like money nigga niggas niggaz shit wanna wit y'all ya yeah yo.

feature.name: Word Profile Match Metal
feature.description: The percentage of words in the text that are found in a list of keywords. This percentage is based on all words present in the text, not just the unique words. Case is ignored. The keywords are: 'cause ain't anger battery bleed blood dead death die end eyes fear fire god gonna hate heaven's human kill lie life night oh ooh shoot tick world yeah yeah!.

feature.name: Duration
feature.description: The total duration in seconds of the music.

feature.name: Acoustic Guitar Fraction
feature.description: Fraction of all Note Ons belonging to acoustic guitar patches (General MIDI patches 25 to 26).

feature.name: Amount of Arpeggiation
feature.description: Fraction of horizontal intervals that are repeated notes, minor thirds, major thirds, perfect fifths, minor sevenths, major sevenths, octaves, minor tenths or major tenths.

feature.name: Average Melodic Interval
feature.description: Average melodic interval (in semi-tones).

feature.name: Average Note Duration
feature.description: Average duration of notes in seconds.

feature.name: Average Note To Note Dynamics Change
feature.description: Average change of loudness from one note to the next note in the same channel (in MIDI velocity units).

feature.name: Average Number of Independent Voices
feature.description: Average number of different channels in which notes have sounded simultaneously. Rests are not included in this calculation.

feature.name: Average Range of Glissandos
feature.description: Average range of Pitch Bends, where range is defined as the greatest value of the absolute difference between 64 and the second data byte of all MIDI Pitch Bend messages falling betweenthe Note On and Note Off messages of any note.

feature.name: Average Time Between Attacks
feature.description: Average time in seconds between Note On events (irregardless of channel).

feature.name: Average Time Between Attacks For Each Voice
feature.description: Average of average times in seconds between Note On events on individual channels that contain at least one note.

feature.name: Average Variability of Time Between Attacks For Each Voice
feature.description: Average standard deviation, in seconds, of time between Note On events on individual channels that contain at least one note.

feature.name: Brass Fraction
feature.description: Fraction of all Note Ons belonging to brass patches (GeneralMIDI patches 57 or 68).

feature.name: Changes of Meter
feature.description: Set to 1 if the time signature is changed one or more times during the recording.

feature.name: Chromatic Motion
feature.description: Fraction of melodic intervals corresponding to a semi-tone.

feature.name: Combined Strength of Two Strongest Rhythmic Pulses
feature.description: The sum of the frequencies of the two beat bins of the peaks with the highest frequencies.

feature.name: Compound Or Simple Meter
feature.description: Set to 1 if the initial meter is compound (numerator of time signature is greater than or equal to 6 and is evenly divisible by 3) and to 0 if it is simple (if the above condition is not fulfilled).

feature.name: Direction of Motion
feature.description: Fraction of melodic intervals that are rising rather than falling.

feature.name: Distance Between Most Common Melodic Intervals
feature.description: Absolute value of the difference between the most common melodic interval and the second most common melodic interval.

feature.name: Dominant Spread
feature.description: Largest number of consecutive pitch classes separated by perfect 5ths that accounted for at least 9% each of the notes.

feature.name: Duration of Melodic Arcs
feature.description: Average number of notes that separate melodic peaks and troughs in any channel.

feature.name: Electric Guitar Fraction
feature.description: Fraction of all Note Ons belonging to electric guitar patches (GeneralMIDI patches 27 to 32).

feature.name: Electric Instrument Fraction
feature.description: Fraction of all Note Ons belonging to electric instrument patches(General MIDI patches 5, 6, 17, 19, 27 to 32 or 34 to 40).

feature.name: Glissando Prevalence
feature.description: Number of Note Ons that have at least one MIDI Pitch Bend associated with them divided by total number of pitched Note Ons.

feature.name: Harmonicity of Two Strongest Rhythmic Pulses
feature.description: The bin label of the higher (in terms of bin label) of the two beat bins of the peaks with the highest frequency divided by the bin label of the lower.

feature.name: Importance of Bass Register
feature.description: Fraction of Note Ons between MIDI pitches 0 and 54.

feature.name: Importance of High Register
feature.description: Fraction of Note Ons between MIDI pitches 73 and 127.

feature.name: Importance of Loudest Voice
feature.description: Difference between the average loudness of the loudest channel and the average loudness of the other channels that contain at least one note.

feature.name: Importance of Middle Register
feature.description: Fraction of Note Ons between MIDI pitches 55 and 72.

feature.name: Initial Tempo
feature.description: Tempo in beats per minute at the start of the recording.

feature.name: Interval Between Strongest Pitch Classes
feature.description: Absolute value of the difference between the pitch classes of the two most common MIDI pitch classes.

feature.name: Interval Between Strongest Pitches
feature.description: Absolute value of the difference between the pitches of the two most common MIDI pitches.

feature.name: Maximum Note Duration
feature.description: Duration of the longest note (in seconds).

feature.name: Maximum Number of Independent Voices
feature.description: Maximum number of different channels in which notes have sounded simultaneously.

feature.name: Melodic Fifths
feature.description: Fraction of melodic intervals that are perfect fifths.

feature.name: Melodic Intervals in Lowest Line
feature.description: Average melodic interval in semitones of the channel with the lowest average pitch divided by the average melodic interval of all channels that contain at least two notes.

feature.name: Melodic Octaves
feature.description: Fraction of melodic intervals that are octaves.

feature.name: Melodic Thirds
feature.description: Fraction of melodic intervals that are major or minor thirds.

feature.name: Melodic Tritones
feature.description: Fraction of melodic intervals that are tritones.

feature.name: Minimum Note Duration
feature.description: Duration of the shortest note (in seconds).

feature.name: Most Common Melodic Interval
feature.description: Melodic interval with the highest frequency.

feature.name: Most Common Melodic Interval Prevalence
feature.description: Fraction of melodic intervals that belong to the most common interval.

feature.name: Most Common Pitch Class
feature.description: Bin label of the most common pitch class.

feature.name: Most Common Pitch Class Prevalence
feature.description: Fraction of Note Ons corresponding to the most common pitch class.

feature.name: Most Common Pitch
feature.description: Bin label of the most common pitch divided by the number of possible pitches.

feature.name: Most Common Pitch Prevalence
feature.description: Fraction of Note Ons corresponding to the most common pitch.

feature.name: Note Density
feature.description: Average number of notes per second.

feature.name: Number of Common Melodic Intervals
feature.description: Number of melodic intervals that represent at least 9% of all melodic intervals.

feature.name: Number of Common Pitches
feature.description: Number of pitches that account individually for at least 9% of all notes.

feature.name: Number of Moderate Pulses
feature.description: Number of beat peaks with normalized frequencies over 0.01.

feature.name: Number of Pitched Instruments
feature.description: Total number of General MIDI patches that are used to play at least one note.

feature.name: Number of Relatively Strong Pulses
feature.description: Number of beat peaks with frequencies at least 30% as high as the frequency of the bin with the highest frequency.

feature.name: Number of Strong Pulses
feature.description: Number of beat peaks with normalized frequencies over 0.1.

feature.name: Number of Unpitched Instruments
feature.description:
Number of distinct MIDI Percussion Key Map patches that were used to play at least one note.
It should be noted that only instruments 35 to 81 are included here, as they are the ones that are included in the official standard.

feature.name: Orchestral Strings Fraction
feature.description: Fraction of all Note Ons belonging to orchestral strings patches(General MIDI patches 41 or 47).

feature.name: Overall Dynamic Range
feature.description: The maximum loudness minus the minimum loudness value.

feature.name: Percussion Prevalence
feature.description: Total number of Note Ons corresponding to unpitched percussion instruments divided by total number of Note Ons in the recording.

feature.name: Pitch Class Variety
feature.description: Number of pitch classes used at least once.

feature.name: Pitch Variety
feature.description: Number of pitches used at least once.

feature.name: Polyrhythms
feature.description: Number of beat peaks with frequencies at least 30% of the highest frequency whose bin labels are not integer multiples or factors (using only multipliers of 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 and 8) (with an accepted error of +/- 3 bins) of the bin label of the peak with the highest frequency. This number is then divided by the total number of beat bins with frequencies over 30% of the highest frequency.

feature.name: Primary Register
feature.description: Average MIDI pitch.

feature.name: Quality
feature.description: Set to 0 if the key signature indicates that a recording is major, set to 1 if it indicates that it is minor and set to 0 if key signature is unknown.

feature.name: Quintuple Meter
feature.description: Set to 1 if numerator of initial time signature is 5, set to 0 otherwise.

feature.name: Range
feature.description: Difference between highest and lowest pitches.

feature.name: Range of Highest Line
feature.description: Difference between the highest note and the lowest note played in the channel with the highest average pitch divided by the difference between the highest note and the lowest note in the piece.

feature.name: Relative Note Density of Highest Line
feature.description: Number of Note Ons in the channel with the highest average pitch divided by the average number of Note Ons in all channels that contain at least one note.

feature.name: Relative Range of Loudest Voice
feature.description: Difference between the highest note and the lowest note played in the channel with the highest average loudness divided by the difference between the highest note and the lowest note overall in the piece.

feature.name: Relative Strength of Most Common Intervals
feature.description: Fraction of melodic intervals that belong to the second most common interval divided by the fraction of melodic intervals belonging to the most common interval.

feature.name: Relative Strength of Top Pitch Classes
feature.description: The frequency of the 2nd most common pitch class divided by the frequency of the most common pitch class.

feature.name: Relative Strength of Top Pitches
feature.description: The frequency of the 2nd most common pitch divided by the frequency of the most common pitch.

feature.name: Repeated Notes
feature.description: Fraction of notes that are repeated melodically.

feature.name: Rhythmic Looseness
feature.description: Average width of beat histogram peaks (in beats per minute). Width is measured for all peaks with frequencies at least 30% as high as the highest peak, and is defined by the distance between the points on the peak in question that are 30% of the height of the peak.

feature.name: Rhythmic Variability
feature.description: Standard deviation of the bin values (except the first 40 empty ones).

feature.name: Saxophone Fraction
feature.description: Fraction of all Note Ons belonging to saxophone patches (GeneralMIDI patches 65 or 68).

feature.name: Second Strongest Rhythmic Pulse
feature.description: Bin label of the beat bin of the peak with the second highest frequency.

feature.name: Size of Melodic Arcs
feature.description: Average melodic interval separating the top note of melodic peaks and the bottom note of melodic troughs.

feature.name: Staccato Incidence
feature.description: Number of notes with durations of less than a 10th of a second divided by the total number of notes in the recording.

feature.name: Stepwise Motion
feature.description: Fraction of melodic intervals that corresponded to a minor or major second.

feature.name: Strength of Second Strongest Rhythmic Pulse
feature.description: Frequency of the beat bin of the peak with the second highest frequency.

feature.name: Strength of Strongest Rhythmic Pulse
feature.description: Frequency of the beat bin with the highest frequency.

feature.name: Strength Ratio of Two Strongest Rhythmic Pulses
feature.description: The frequency of the higher (in terms of frequency) of the two beat bins corresponding to the peaks with the highest frequency divided by the frequency of the lower.

feature.name: String Ensemble Fraction
feature.description: Fraction of all Note Ons belonging to string ensemble patches(General MIDI patches 49 to 52).

feature.name: String Keyboard Fraction
feature.description: Fraction of all Note Ons belonging to string keyboard patches (GeneralMIDI patches 1 to 8).

feature.name: Strongest Rhythmic Pulse
feature.description: Bin label of the beat bin with the highest frequency.

feature.name: Strong Tonal Centres
feature.description: Number of peaks in the fifths pitch histogram that each account for at least 9% of all Note Ons.

feature.name: Triple Meter
feature.description: Set to 1 if numerator of initial time signature is 3, set to 0 otherwise.

feature.name: Variability of Note Duration
feature.description: Standard deviation of note durations in seconds.

feature.name: Variability of Note Prevalence of Pitched Instruments
feature.description: Standard deviation of the fraction of Note Ons played by each (pitched) General MIDI instrument that is used to play at least one note.

feature.name: Variability of Note Prevalence of Unpitched Instruments
feature.description:
Standard deviation of the fraction of Note Ons played by each (unpitched) MIDI Percussion Key Map instrument that is used to play at least one note.
It should be noted that only instruments 35 to 81 are included here, as they are the ones that are included in the official standard.

feature.name: Variability of Number of Independent Voices
feature.description: Standard deviation of number of different channels in which notes have sounded simultaneously. Rests are not included in this calculation.

feature.name: Variability of Time Between Attacks
feature.description: Standard deviation of the times, in seconds, between Note On events (irregardless of channel).

feature.name: Variation of Dynamics
feature.description: Standard deviation of loudness levels of all notes.

feature.name: Variation of Dynamics In Each Voice
feature.description: The average of the standard deviations of loudness levels within each channel that contains at least one note.

feature.name: Vibrato Prevalence
feature.description: Number of notes for which Pitch Bend messages change direction at least twice divided by total number of notes that have Pitch Bend messages associated with them.

feature.name: Violin Fraction
feature.description: Fraction of all Note Ons belonging to violin patches (GeneralMIDI patches 41 or 111).

feature.name: Voice Equality - Dynamics
feature.description: Standard deviation of the average volume of notes in each channel that contains at least one note.

feature.name: Voice Equality - Melodic Leaps
feature.description: Standard deviation of the average melodic leap in MIDI pitches for each channel that contains at least one note.

feature.name: Voice Equality - Note Duration
feature.description: Standard deviation of the total duration of notes in seconds in each channel that contains at least one note.

feature.name: Voice Equality - Number of Notes
feature.description: Standard deviation of the total number of Note Ons in each channel that contains at least one note.

feature.name: Voice Equality - Range
feature.description: Standard deviation of the differences between the highest and lowest pitches in each channel that contains at least one note.

feature.name: Voice Separation
feature.description: Average separation in semi-tones between the average pitches of consecutive channels (after sorting based/non average pitch) that contain at least one note.

feature.name: Woodwinds Fraction
feature.description: Fraction of all Note Ons belonging to woodwind patches (GeneralMIDI patches 69 or 76).

feature.description: The secondary search string.

feature.description: The secondary search string.
